name: EQUALS MONTH
description: This is a TAS Professional 3.0 command here for compatibility. The preferred method is to use the =MNTH() function for the month number, or =CMNTH() for alphanumeric month.

parameters.name: recv_field
parameters.description: The field that is going to receive the month value. If the receiving field is A type then the result is the character month. If the receiving field is numeric the result is the month number (1-12).

parameters.name: date_field
parameters.description: The field containing the date value to use for calculating the month.

comments: This is the equivalent of the TAS Professional 3.0 command Equals Month.
